headline: Housing for Ukrainians in France
border_crossing: In this very moment, thousands of Ukrainians are crossing their borders and don't know where to go next.\nIf you wish to help, the best way is to offer them a roof to stay.
welcome: If you can host people at your place, do not hesitate to let us know by filling the form below
ninety_days: Ukrainian citizens can stay in the Schengen up to 90 days.\nAfter that they need a residence permit in France.
data_protection: Your data will only be used to contact you and will be transmitted to the NGOs that are in a position to put you in touch with Ukrainians looking for a place to stay.
rooms: Fill this form to offer a room (or more) to the refugees in need.
data_protection_form: Your data will only be used to contact you and will be transmitted to the NGOs that are in a position to put you in touch with Ukrainians looking for a place to stay. You will find the list of NGOs here
send: Send the offer to be a host
open_source: This is an Open Source project
contributions: Do not hesitate to participate or suggest improvements
